Genus: Acacia, Acaciella, Mariosousa, Senegalia and Vachellia

Family: Pinaceae - pines, Araucariaceae - araucarias, Podocarpaceae - podocarpus or yellow-wood, Sciadopityaceae - umbrella pines, Cupressaceae - cypress, Cephalotaxaceae - plum yew, Taxaceae - yew

Genus: Macropidia fuliginosa and seven Anigozanthos species

Species: 39 known species, including angustifolia, stoechas, lantana, and dentata
11 - including the boojum tree F. columnaris
varieties of pepo, maxima, moschata, and argyrosperma
about 500 species of Cyathea; about 25 species of Dicksonia

Genus: Yucca - about 40 species and Hesperoyucca - 2 species
